system.description:
Make a Charisma check to enact one of the following effects. If you fail, you can't use that effect again until you successfully rest.

  • @UUID[Compendium.shadowdark.class-abilities.Item.jg2sUC3nIAI8sT18]{Inspire} DC 12. One target in near gains a luck token.

  • @UUID[Compendium.shadowdark.class-abilities.Item.oCNpE6bnZjPIdOO1]{Fascinate} DC 15. You transfix all targets of level 4 or less within near for 1d4 rounds.
